Nav.btn-client-mobile: Get Cozy Drive on your mobile!
Nav.banner-txt-client: Tip: your pictures, bills, ID documents, all accessible anytime, from any of your device with Cozy Drive installed on your computer

shareByLink.title: By public link
shareByLink.subtitle: Share by link
shareByLink.desc: Anyone with the provided link can see and download your files.

shareByEmail.title: By email
shareByEmail.subtitle: Share by email
shareByEmail.emailPlaceholder: Enter email address or name of your recipient

protectedShare.title: Coming soon!
protectedShare.desc: Share anything by email with your family and friends!

error.generic: An error occurred when creating the file share link, please try again.

deleteconfirmation.title: Delete this element? |||| Delete these elements?
deleteconfirmation.trash: It will be moved to the Trash. |||| They will be moved to the Trash.
deleteconfirmation.restore: You can still restore it whenever you want. |||| You can still restore them whenever you want.
deleteconfirmation.shared: If you have shared it, people won't be able to access it. |||| If you have shared them, people won't be able to access them.
deleteconfirmation.referenced: Some of the files within the selection are related to a photo album. They will be removed from it if you proceed to trash them.

emptytrashconfirmation.title: Permanently delete?
emptytrashconfirmation.forbidden: You won't be able to access these files anymore.
emptytrashconfirmation.restore: You won't be able to restore these files if you didn't make a backup.

destroyconfirmation.title: Permanently delete?
destroyconfirmation.forbidden: You won't be able to access this file anymore. |||| You won't be able to access these files anymore.
destroyconfirmation.restore: You won't be able to restore this file if you didn't make a backup. |||| You won't be able to restore these files if you didn't make a backup.

quotaalert.title: Your disk space is full :(
quotaalert.desc: Please remove files and empty your trash before uploading files again.

empty.title: You don’t have any files in this folder.
empty.text: Click the "upload" button to add files to this folder.

trash.title: You don’t have any deleted files.
trash.text: Move files you don't need anymore to the Trash and permanently delete items to free up storage page.

error.open_folder: Something went wrong when opening the folder.

download_file.offline: You should be connected to download this file

error.public_unshared_title: Sorry, this link is no longer available.
error.public_unshared_text: One lost, ten found... or just check out with the owner for help. This file might not be lost.

alert.try_again: An error has occurred, please try again in a moment.
alert.restore_file_success: The selection has been successfully restored.
alert.trash_file_success: The selection has been moved to the Trash.
alert.destroy_file_success: The selection has been deleted permanently.
alert.folder_name: The element %{folderName} already exists, please choose a new name.
alert.folder_generic: An error occurred, please try again.
alert.folder_abort: You need to add a name to your new folder if you would like to save it. Your information has not been saved.
alert.offline: This feature is not available offline.

welcome.no_account_link: Don’t have an account? Request one here.

server_selection.description: This is the web address you use to access your Cozy.
server_selection.wrong_address_with_email: You typed an email address. To connect on your cozy you must type its url, something like https://tonystark.mycozy.cloud
server_selection.wrong_address_v2: You have just entered the address of old Cozy version. This application is only compatible with the latest version. [Please refer to our site for more information.](https://blog.cozycloud.cc/post/2016/11/21/On-the-road-to-Cozy-version-3?lang=en)
server_selection.wrong_address: This address doesn’t seem to be a cozy. Please check the address you provide.

files.title: Access your drive
files.description: In order to save your Cozy Drive on your device, the application must access your files.

photos.title: Backup your photos and videos
photos.description: Automatically backup the photos taken with your phone to your Cozy, so you never lose them.

contacts.title: Sync your contacts
contacts.description: Save your phone's contact on your Cozy — this will facilitate sharing files with them.

analytics.title: Help us improve Cozy
analytics.description: The application will automatically provide data (mainly errors) to Cozy Cloud. It will allow us to resolve problems faster.

unlink.title: Reset this application
unlink.description: By clicking Reset, you will be able to start your application over, and will only lose the data saved on your smartphone.

confirmation.title: Reset this application?
confirmation.description: By logging out of your Cozy, you will erase all data synchronized locally by your mobile application.

images.title: Backup images
images.label: Backup your images automatically to your Cozy not to ever lose them and share them easily.

wifi.title: Backup on WIFI only
wifi.label: If the option is enabled, your device will only backup photos when it's on WIFI in order to save your package.

analytics.title: Help us improve Cozy
analytics.label: The application will automatically provide data (mainly errors) to Cozy Cloud. It will allow us to resolve problems faster.

logs.title: Help us to understand your problem
logs.description: Send the application log to help us improve its quality and stability.
logs.success: Thanks, we will investigate your problem and contact you soon.
logs.error: A problem happened, logs couldn't be sent, please try again.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.subtitle: Import contacts
contacts.text: Import the contacts from your device to your Cozy to easily share content with them.

open_with.offline: You should be connected to open this file
open_with.noapp: No application can open this file

revoked.title: Access revoked
revoked.description: It appears you revoked this device from your Cozy. If you didn't, please let us know at contact@cozycloud.cc. All your local data related to your Cozy will be removed.

feedback.title: Would you mind giving us some feedback?

email.subject: Feedback on Cozy Drive
email.placeholder: Hello, I think Cozy Drive would be better if…

alert.declined: Awesome. You will love the upcoming features. Stay Cozy!
alert.later: No problem, we'll ask again later.
alert.feedback: Thank you for the feedback. We'll definitely work on it!

alert.success: %{smart_count} file uploaded with success. |||| %{smart_count} files uploaded with success.
alert.success_conflicts: %{smart_count} file uploaded with %{conflictNumber} conflict(s). |||| %{smart_count} files uploaded with %{conflictNumber} conflict(s).
alert.errors: Errors occurred during the file upload.

UploadQueue.header: Uploading %{smart_count} photo to Cozy Drive |||| Uploading %{smart_count} photos to Cozy Drive
